creator: Tangentweb
descriptionHtml:
Tangentweb is a video streaming app that offers thousands of hours of premium, exclusive, Fresh and original content like never before, tailored for Indians all across the globe, from leading Producers, acclaimed writers, award winning Directors and Publishers. It’s a one-stop app for stories from different worlds ranging from rom-coms, horror, mysteries and thrillers to crime, drama, with a fusion of different genres for youngsters as well as families. We have some of the best Movies, TV Shows, Web Series, Music Videos and Short Videos with a high level audio/video streaming technology and a high attention to quality of user experience across devices and platforms which makes Tangentweb the complete destination of programs under the categories like entertainment, edutainment, docutainment and info-tainment for over the top audio/video consumers with no bars for any region catering to our regional language speakers, both in India and abroad.

USER FRIENDLY INTERFACE & WELL EQUIPPED CONTENT DIRECTORY

Using a series of logical algorithms and human curation, users at any stage of their interaction with Tangentweb will discover the curated list of creative contents which makes Tangentweb the destination for the best content from different regions.

ACCESS PLATFORM

Tangentweb can be accessed at www.tangentweb.in and is available on the Google Play Store, Apple App Store & Windows Store for mobile and tablet applications. Tangentweb being a screen agnostic platform, is also available across Smart TV’s and streaming devices like Amazon Fire TV, Google Chromecast, Apple TV etc.



Contact / Support

You can contact us for any support related matters at support@tangentweb.in send your feedback to feedback@tangentweb.in.

Any questions specifically about this Privacy Statement, or related to our use of your personal information or similar queries, you may contact our Data Protection Officer by sending an email: support@tangentweb.in

The services are operated and provided by Tangentweb, If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at support@Tangentweb.in

You can also write us at - Tangentweb, B-1 104, 1st Floor, Ijmima Complex, Diagonally opposite to Infinity Mall, Mindspace, Link road, Malad, West, Mumbai-400064
